data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Bueng Kan, Thailand, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bueng Kan, Thailand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Bueng Kan, Thailand to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 2,707 believers in Bueng Kan and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 2,707 believers in the state of Bueng Kan to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, please remember the Aheu Luang people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
God, we pray for the believers in Bueng Kan, Thailand to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Bueng Kan, Thailand that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bueng Kan, Thailand has a population of 418,600.

We estimate Bueng Kan has 2,707 people who might know Jesus, 2,763 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 413,130 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 2,707 believers in Bueng Kan, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.
